item.title: Shouldly: Why would you assert any other way?
item.description: I like to make my development life as easy as possible - and removing small irritations is a great way of doing this. Having used Shouldly in anger for a long time, I have to say I feel a little hamstrung when going back to just using NUnit’s assertions. I have been known on a couple of projects which use only NUnit assertions, when trying to solve a test failure with array differences, to install Shouldly, fix the test, then remove Shouldly again!
